languages.text: "Браво, Окти. Этот амасек... он мне идет". {n}Самодовольная реплика Джай вызывает общий смех, и обстановка слегка разряжается.{/n}
"Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Браво, Окти. Этот амасек... он мне идет". {n}Самодовольная реплика Джай вызывает общий смех, и обстановка слегка разряжается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

"Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

languages.text: “太棒了，小奥。这瓶艾玛赛克酒我相当喜欢……真的相当喜欢。”{n}婕伊自我满足的回答引起了众人的大笑，餐桌边的紧张气氛似乎缓和了些。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “太棒了，小奥。这瓶艾玛赛克酒我相当喜欢……真的相当喜欢。”{n}婕伊自我满足的回答引起了众人的大笑，餐桌边的紧张气氛似乎缓和了些。{/n}

languages.text: 「ブラボー、オクティ。このアマセックはアタシにぴったりだ…本当にね」{n}ジェイの満足したような返事は、全体の笑いを誘い、テーブルの緊張が少し緩んだように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ブラボー、オクティ。このアマセックはアタシにぴったりだ…本当にね」{n}ジェイの満足したような返事は、全体の笑いを誘い、テーブルの緊張が少し緩んだように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: «Estupendo, Octi. Este amasec me vale... Me sienta estupendamente». {n}La respuesta satisfecha de Jae desata la risa generalizada y la tensión de la mesa parece aliviarse un poco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estupendo, Octi. Este amasec me vale... Me sienta estupendamente». {n}La respuesta satisfecha de Jae desata la risa generalizada y la tensión de la mesa parece aliviarse un poco.{/n}

languages.text: « Bravo, Octa. Cet amasec me convient très bien... Oh oui, parfaitement bien. » {n}La réponse satisfaite de Jae provoque l'hilarité générale et la tension autour de la table semble légèrement s'apaiser.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bravo, Octa. Cet amasec me convient très bien... Oh oui, parfaitement bien. » {n}La réponse satisfaite de Jae provoque l'hilarité générale et la tension autour de la table semble légèrement s'apaiser.{/n}

languages.text: "Bravo, Octy. Dieses Amasec wird mir sehr gut tun ... extrem gut." {n}Jaes selbstzufriedene Ansage löst allgemeines Gelächter aus und die Spannung am Tisch scheint sich ein wenig zu lockern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bravo, Octy. Dieses Amasec wird mir sehr gut tun ... extrem gut." {n}Jaes selbstzufriedene Ansage löst allgemeines Gelächter aus und die Spannung am Tisch scheint sich ein wenig zu lockern.{/n}

languages.text: "Bravo Octy. Bu amasek gerçekten de hakkımı veriyor." {n}Jae'ın kendini yücelten yanıtı, herkesi güldürerek masadaki gerilimi birazcık azaltıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bravo, Octy. This amasec will do me very well... very well indeed." {n}Jae's self-satisfied reply elicits general laughter, and the tension at the table seems to loosen slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bravo Octy. Bu amasek hakkımı veriyor gerçekten de." {n}Jae'ın kendini yücelten yanıtı herkesi güldürüyor ve masadaki gerilim birazcık azalmışa benziyor.{/n}
